price: ߞߙߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߣߊ߬ ߢߐ߲߮ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊ߸ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߘߍ߬ߢߐ߲߮ ߠߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߗߍ߫ ߓߘߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
